last_episode_to_air.name: Toward Tomorrow
last_episode_to_air.overview: When the last person to obtain the Shikon Jewel makes the one correct wish, the jewel will be purified and disappear entirely from this world. The long journey of Inuyasha and his companions comes to end and thus concludes this Feudal Fairy Tale.

name: InuYasha
overview: Kagome Higurashi is a modern day young girl who lives with her family by the old Higure shrine. Unbeknownst to Kagome, she is the reincarnation of priestess Kikyo and posseses the "Jewel of Four Souls" (the Shikon jewel). One ill-fated day, Kagome locates an ancient well near her home and is abruptly transported through the well and into a feudal Japan, inhabited by demons. There, she encounters Inuyasha, son of a powerful demon father and a human mother, who is pinned to a tree by an enchanted arrow.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Kagome Higurashi, an average ninth grader, gets pulled into an ancient well by a demon, bringing her 500 years in the past to a feudal era. There she meets Inuyasha, a half-demon who seeks the Shikon Jewel to make himself a full-fledged demon. With Inuyasha and new friends, Kagome's search for the Jewel of Four Souls begins...

seasons.name: The Final Act
seasons.overview: Inuyasha, Kagome, Miroku, Sango, Shippou and their neko-mata friend Kirara, are now in the final leg of their quest to put an end to the elusive demon, Naraku and all of the chaos and evil he has caused, and to ultimately undo the unfortunate karma of the Jewel of Four Souls. Their journey, however, will not be easy as their remaining enemies put out all the stops to make sure that they do not accomplish their goal.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Overcame Time... and the Boy Who Was Just Overcome
episodes.overview: In feudal Japan, the half demon Inuyasha was sealed away by the priestess Kikyo. Many years later he is revived by Kagome, who has slipped through time from the present day. Kagome is surprised when the sacred Shikon Jewel, which makes demons stronger, emerges from a cut on her body.

episodes.name: Seekers of the Sacred Jewel
episodes.overview: Kagome finds out that she may be the reincarnation of Kaede's late older sister, the priestess Kikyo, who sealed Inuyasha with her arrow. The Carrion Crow demon is after the Shikon Jewel and kidnaps Kagome, but Inuyasha shows up to save her. After Kagome defeats the Carrion Crow with an arrow, the Shikon Jewel shatters into pieces.

episodes.name: Down the Rabbit Hole and Back Again
episodes.overview: Kagome has the ability to see pieces of the Shikon Jewel. Inuyasha has the power to defeat demons. Both of their powers are needed to gather the shards of the jewel that were scattered, but the two don't get along. The demon Yura, who is after the jewel, manipulates villagers to attack Inuyasha.

episodes.name: Yura of the Demon-Hair
episodes.overview: Kagome has returned to the present day and is relaxing in her home when Inuyasha comes looking for her. Some of Yura's demonic hair is on his body. Kagome and Inuyasha return to feudal Japan to exterminate the Yura of the hair.

episodes.name: Aristocratic Assassin, Sesshomaru
episodes.overview: Kagome learns that Inuyasha is a half demon, born of a human mother and a dog demon. Inuyasha's half brother Sesshomaru appears, looking for the tomb of their father. In order to manipulate Inuyasha, he brings Inuyasha's dead human mother with him. But the woman turns out to be a demon known as a muonna.

episodes.name: Tetsusaiga, the Phantom Sword
episodes.overview: The muonna makes Inuyasha reveal the location of his father's grave. Sesshomaru removes Inuyasha's right eye (the black pearl) and opens the entrance to the grave. Kagome is angered by Sesshomaru's cruelty. She goes with Inuyasha after Sesshomaru. Inside their father's tomb is a memento of Inuyasha's father, the sword Tetsusaiga.

episodes.name: Showdown! Inuyasha vs. Sesshomaru
episodes.overview: Kagome is able to pull out the Tetsusaiga. Sesshomaru tries to kill her, and Inuyasha is angered and fights to protect Kagome. His will to protect a human changes the Tetsusaiga into its true form, a fang sword.

episodes.name: The Toad Who Would Be Prince
episodes.overview: In the Kai Province, there is a young samurai named Nobunaga. He is a clumsy but earnest young man. He has heard rumors about the man that the the princess, his childhood friend, has married. Nobunaga tries to save the lord of the castle who is possessed by a toad demon.

episodes.name: Shippo and the Thunder Brothers
episodes.overview: Shippo is a demon fox whose father was killed by the the Thunder Brothers: Hiten and Manten. He steals the Shikon Jewel shards from Kagome so that he can avenge his father.

episodes.name: Phantom Showdown - The Thunder Brothers vs. Tetsusaiga
episodes.overview: Inuyasha goes to save Kagome from Manten. Hiten devours the sacred jewel shard that Manten had and absorbs his demon powers. Hiten attacks Inuyasha with his Raigekijin. Inuyasha is in trouble and defends himself with the scabbard of the Tetsusaiga.

episodes.name: Terror of the Ancient Noh Mask
episodes.overview: Kagome has returned to the present day to take a test. As she does, a noh mask, the Mask of Flesh, begins a violent search for the Shikon Jewel shards. Kagome's younger brother, Sota, tries hard to call Inuyasha to come to Kagome's rescue.

episodes.name: The Soul Piper and the Mischievous Little Soul
episodes.overview: Kagome sees a Soul Piper, a demon that consoles the spirits of children. She helps Mayu, a girl who is about to become an evil spirit, to pass on.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the New Moon and the Black-haired Inuyasha
episodes.overview: Half demon Inuyasha's secret is that he becomes human once a month. That day, Inuyasha and the gang meet Nazuna and stay at a mountain temple. They fall into Kumogashira's trap and the sacred jewel shards are taken away from them. Inuyasha is injected with poison!

episodes.name: Kikyo's Stolen Ashes
episodes.overview: The ogress, Urasue, robs the grave of Kikyo, the priestess who sealed away Inuyasha fifty years ago. She revives Kikyo's body using the ashes of Kikyo's bones and soil from Kikyo's grave. But Kikyo's soul has already been reincarnated in a different body.

episodes.name: Return of the Tragic Priestess, Kikyo
episodes.overview: Kikyo is revived when Kagome's soul flows into her. She tries to kill Inuyasha, but Kagome takes back her soul. Fifty years ago, Kikyo wanted Inuyasha to use the Shikon Jewel to become human. But on the day of their promise, someone who looked like Inuyasha fatally injured Kikyo. Inuyasha realizes that there is a mysterious person who made them fight.

episodes.name: Mystical Hand of the Amorous Monk, Miroku
episodes.overview: Miroku, a womanizing delinquent priest, has been collecting Shikon Jewel shards and steals Kagome's shards. Inuyasha tracks him down and confronts Miroku to get the shards back. Miroku fights back with his priestly powers and the wind tunnel in his hand that he was cursed with.

episodes.name: The Cursed Ink of the Hell-Painter
episodes.overview: Kotatsu, a painter, sees a dream in which he becomes successful by controlling an army of ogres drawn with ink that has a sacred jewel shard in it. Miroku, Inuyasha and the others become involved in protecting the princess that Kotatsu is in love with.

episodes.name: Naraku and Sesshomaru Join Forces
episodes.overview: Naraku appears before Sesshomaru and lends him an arm with a sacred jewel shard embedded in it. Sesshomaru attaches the arm to himself and appears before Inuyasha and the gang to steal the Tetsusaiga.

episodes.name: Go Home to Your Own Time, Kagome!
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru wields the Tetsusaiga with his borrowed arm against Inuyasha, who fights back with his scabbard. When the two strike each other at the same time, Inuyasha gets up close to Sesshomaru, rips off his arm, and gets back the Tetsusaiga. When Inuyasha learns Naraku's plan, he fears that Kagome might die.

episodes.name: Despicable Villain! The Mystery of Onigumo
episodes.overview: Kagome has her sacred jewel shards taken away from her and is returned to the present day, unable to return to feudal Japan. Back to her normal life, she agrees to go on a date with Hojo. Meanwhile, Inuyasha and the gang try to find out more about the mysterious Naraku.

episodes.name: Naraku's True Identity Unveiled
episodes.overview: Kagome returns to the shrine in the middle of her date with Hojo. She senses the presence of the Shikon Jewel shards and returns to feudal Japan. Naraku reveals that fifty years ago, Onigumo was in love with Kikyo. The demons that were drawn to Onigumo by his malice devoured Onigumo, and the demon Naraku was born.

episodes.name: A Wicked Smile; Kikyo's Wandering Soul
episodes.overview: Kikyo, who was brought back to life, is living as a priestess. A monk, who realizes that Kikyo is dead, tries to make Kikyo pass on, but Kikyo ends up killing him. Inuyasha saves the monk's disciples and runs to Kikyo when he hears the priestess's name.

episodes.name: Kagome's Voice and Kikyo's Kiss
episodes.overview: Kikyo paralyzes Kagome. Inuyasha appears before her. Kikyo has been gathering the souls of dead girls. She vents her grudge against Inuyasha. Inuyasha reveals that he has never forgotten her. When Inuyasha kisses Kikyo, Kikyo tries to drag him to hell. But Inuyasha hears Kagome's voice and regains consciousness.

episodes.name: Enter Sango, the Demon Slayer
episodes.overview: Sango, a demon slayer, is invited to Hitomi Castle along with her father, the leader of the demon slayers, and her younger brother, Kohaku. But it is a trap. Meanwhile, the undefended village is attacked by a horde of demons and annihilated. Naraku takes the Shikon Jewel shards that they had been gathering and leaves.

episodes.name: Naraku's Insidious Plot
episodes.overview: Sango fights Inuyasha, believing him to be her enemy. Naraku's plan is to have her fight to the death using the power of the Shikon Jewel shard. But Sango listens to Kagome and is no longer suspicious of Inuyasha.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Sacred Jewel Revealed
episodes.overview: Sango reveals the secret story of the Shikon Jewel's birth. Midoriko, a priestess with powerful spiritual powers, fused with many demons after a battle to the death. She absorbed the souls of the demons into her own, punched out her soul, and died. Her soul is the Shikon Jewel.

episodes.name: The Lake of the Evil Water God
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the gang meet Taromaru, the son of a village leader. They go to the Temple of the Water God, where children are being sacrificed. The Water God has a sacred treasure and toys around with the group.

episodes.name: Miroku Falls Into A Dangerous Trap!
episodes.overview: After Miroku sucks a mantis demon into his Wind Tunnel, the demon manages to rip the tunnel. Panicked, Miroku returns to the home of his mentor, Mushin, to repair it. Haunted with memories of his father's death, Miroku must come to terms with his Wind Tunnel as demons attack Mushin's temple.

episodes.name: Sango's Suffering and Kohaku's Life
episodes.overview: Naraku uses one of Sango's fellow demon slayers as a bargaining chip to try to persuade Sango into giving him Inuyasha's sword, Tetsusaiga.

episodes.name: Tetsusaiga is Stolen! Showdown at Naraku's Castle
episodes.overview: In the hopes of saving Kohaku, Sango steals Inuyasha's Tetsusaiga and hands it over to Naraku. However, a battle against Naraku soon ensues.

episodes.name: Jinenji, Kind Yet Sad
episodes.overview: While looking for an antidote to cure the ailing Kilala, Inuyasha and Kagome come across the herb garden of the half-demon, Jinenji, who is constantly bullied by the prejudiced locals.

episodes.name: Kikyo & Inuyasha, Into the Miasma
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the others stumble across a cave full of demons fighting to the death. They soon discover that Naraku is using to find a new demon to integrate into his being. However, the large demonic aura brings Kikyo into the mess.

episodes.name: Kikyo, Captured by Naraku
episodes.overview: Acting under Naraku's request, Kikyo traps the Inuyasha gang with an illusory mist, causing them to have nightmarish visions.

episodes.name: Tetsusaiga and Tenseiga
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the others are introduced to Totosai, the swordsmith who forged Inuyasha's Tetsusaiga and Sesshomaru's healing sword, Tenseiga.

episodes.name: The True Owner of the Great Sword
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Sesshomaru continue fighting for the Tetsusaiga.  After the fight, while  Sesshomaru is recovering, a little orphan girl, Rin, tries to bring him food.  When her village is attacked by wolf demons, Sesshomaru returns the favor and helps Rin.  Meanwhile, Kagome senses a jewel shard.  Inuyasha and gang  follow her lead to the massacred village, where they are quickly surrounded by wolves and Koga.

episodes.name: Kagome Kidnapped by Koga, the Wolf-Demon
episodes.overview: When Koga, a wolf demon, kidnaps Kagome and Shippo,  Inuyasha, Miroku and Sango go on a rescue mission.  But there's another foe they must defeat first, before they can reach  their kidnapped companions.

episodes.name: The Man Who Fell In Love With Kagome
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the group must battle the Birds of Paradise, before they can reach the wolf den.  Meanwhile, back at the den,  Koga expresses his true feelings for Kagome.  When the final battle with the Birds ensues, will Inuyasha's jealousy cost Koga his life?

episodes.name: Two Hearts, One Mind
episodes.overview: Kagome has returned home from the Feudal Era after an argument with Inuyasha.  While waiting for Inuyasha to apologize, she spends time with her friends and Hojo approaches her, once again.  Meanwhile, Inuyasha gets some advice from Kaede on the situation.

episodes.name: Trapped in a Duel to the Death!
episodes.overview: While Inuyasha's gang follows a demon bear with a jewel shard,  Koga meets with some demons from the northern pack who tell him about their plan to storm a castle where a man has many jewel shards.  When the chase leads Inuyasha and his comrades to the castle, they meet up with Koga, who is furious at the slaughter of the wolf demons.

episodes.name: The Deadly Trap of the Wind Sorceress, Kagura
episodes.overview: While Miroku and Sango fight Naraku's demon puppet, Inuyasha and Koga continue their deadly battle, with Kagura planning to kill the winner.

episodes.name: Kagura's Dance and Kanna's Mirror
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his companions come upon an orphan named Koharu, a young woman who believes she is in love with Miroku, after he helped her three years ago.  When Koharu needs help again, they assist her and find her a  home in a new village.  When Naraku sends Kagura and Kanna to destroy  Inuyasha and his companions,  Koharu and the villagers become the new pawns in Naraku's devious plan.

episodes.name: The Wind Scar Fails
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his group must defend themselves against an attack on multiple fronts.  Kanna  attacks  Kagome, attempting to suck her soul into her mirror while Sango remains unconscious in the same room.  Koharu tries to stab Miroku, while  Inuyasha battles Kagura.  Can  Inuyasha use his Wind Scar to defeat her?

episodes.name: Tetsusaiga Breaks
episodes.overview: Inuyasha, though still recovering from his serious wounds, fights Goshinki, a demon who is eating an entire village.

episodes.name: Kaijinbo's Evil Sword
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru goes to a swordsmith, Kaijinbo, to get a new sword made from the fangs of the demon that broke Tetsusaiga, Goshinki.  But something unexpected happens, and Kaijinbo attacks Inuyasha on the night of the new moon, when Inuyasha reverts to his human form.

episodes.name: Sesshomaru Wields Tokijin
episodes.overview: Inuyasha, wielding a too heavy Tetsusaiga, tries to defend himself against Kaijinbo who has been possessed by Tokijin. Unbeknownst to Inuyasha, Sesshomaru is looking for Kaijinbo and the sword he had commissioned.  Will Inuyasha be able to withstand his brother, when Sesshomaru reclaims Tokijin?

episodes.name: Juromaru and Kageromaru
episodes.overview: Naraku sends his two new incarnations, Juromaru & Kageromaru, to attack Koga,  and also, Inuyasha and his companions.  Can Inuyasha and Koga work together as a team to defeat these new foes?

episodes.name: Onigumo's Heart Still Beats Within Naraku
episodes.overview: As Inuyasha and the others recover from their battle with Juromaru and  Kageromaru, Kagome goes home.  Meanwhile, Naraku comes after Kikyo, and she must flee for her life.

episodes.name: Return to the Place Where We First Met
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Kagome must sort out their feeings for each other, after Kagome has spied him with Kikyou, again.  Who will Inuyasha choose?

episodes.name: Kohaku's Lost Memory
episodes.overview: While searching for Naraku's castle, Inuyasha and his group find Kohaku, who has lost his memory.

episodes.name: That Unforgettable Face!
episodes.overview: Sango and Kilala fight off demons in the woods, while Inuyasha and Miroku face off against Kagura, a horde of demons and Naraku's wasps.  Meanwhile, Kagome faces Kohaku, who is being ordered to kill her by Naraku.

episodes.name: Inuyasha's Soul, Devoured
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru learns from the wise tree-demon, Boku'seno that when Inuyasha transforms into a demon, his demon blood takes full control turning him into a mindless killing machine. Elsewhere, Inuyasha and the others arrive at a village that is ruthlessly being held under the control of the Moth Demon, Gatenmaru and his band of thieves.

episodes.name: The Demon's True Nature
episodes.overview: Inuyasha, once again, transforms into a demon when faced with Gatenmaru's murderous attack against himself, Miroku, and the helpless women of a  village. Sesshomaru then appears to see if what Boku'seno told him about demon Inuyasha was true.

episodes.name: Father's Old Enemy: Ryukotsusei
episodes.overview: Totosai tells Inuyasha that piercing the heart of Ryukotsusei, the demon that gave his father his mortal wound, will make his Tetsusaiga lighter. Inuyasha then decides to kill Ryukotsusei.

episodes.name: The Backlash Wave: Tetsusaiga's Ultimate Technique
episodes.overview: Inuyasha fights Ryukotsusei with Tetsusaiga's ultimate attack: The Backlash Wave!

episodes.name: The Stone Flower and Shippo's First Love
episodes.overview: Shippo develops a crush on Satsuki, a girl who hopes to wish her dead brother back to life with a fake Shikon shard.

episodes.name: Temptress in the Mist
episodes.overview: Sango and Miroku investigate a demon princess who is stealing the men from a village.

episodes.name: Fateful Night in Togenkyo (1)
episodes.overview: After Sango leaves to repair her damaged Hiraikotsu, Inuyasha and the others come across a demon tree and a sage known as Tokajin, who uses humans to feed the tree so it can grow a fruit of immortality. Not only do the four manage to be caught by Tokajin in some way, but it's also the night of the new moon, when Inuyasha becomes human.

episodes.name: Fateful Night in Togenkyo (2)
episodes.overview: After Sango leaves to repair her damaged Hiraikotsu, Inuyasha and the others come across a Demon tree and the Peach Man who uses humans to feed it so it can grow a fruit of immortality. Not only do the four manage to caught by the Peach Man in some way, but it's also the night of the New Moon when Inuyasha becomes human!

episodes.name: The Beautiful Sister Apprentices
episodes.overview: As Sango is repairing her damaged Hiraikotsu at her home village, she encounters two sisters who ask her to teach all she knows about demon slaying.

episodes.name: The 50 Year-Old Curse of the Dark Priestess
episodes.overview: Naraku enlists the help of Tsubaki, a dark priestess with a fifty year grudge against Kikyo, to possess Kagome and use her to kill Inuyasha!

episodes.name: Kikyo and the Dark Priestess
episodes.overview: After a confrontation with Kikyo, Tsubaki goes off to face Inuyasha and the others.

episodes.name: Tsubaki's Unrelenting Evil Spell
episodes.overview: Kagome fights Tsubaki's curse from within herself as Inuyasha and the others continue to struggle against Tsubaki and her gaggle of demons.

episodes.name: The Red and White Priestesses
episodes.overview: In order to keep Inuyasha and the others at bay while she invokes the power of a sealed-up ogre, Tsubaki enlists the help of two rookie priestesses.

episodes.name: Giant Ogre of the Forbidden Tower
episodes.overview: Tsubaki uses the once sealed ogre in a final attempt to kill off Inuyasha once and for all...

episodes.name: Farewell Days of My Youth
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the gang enjoy the hospitality of a village they saved from a centipede demon. However, their stay is interrupted by a string of strange possessions taking hold of the group.

episodes.name: Naraku's Barrier - Kagura's Decision
episodes.overview: As Naraku's protective barrier around his castle inexplicably weakens, Kagura comtemplates making her move for freedom.

episodes.name: The Howling Wind of Betrayal
episodes.overview: Koga furiously attacks Kagura in hopes of retrieving his stolen Shikon shards.

episodes.name: Shippo Gets an Angry Challenge
episodes.overview: Shippo receives a duel invitation from the last remaining Thunder Brother, Souten.

episodes.name: Terror of the Faceless Man
episodes.overview: A chunk of flesh rejected by Naraku, takes form and terrorizes the countryside.

episodes.name: Onigumo's Memory Restored
episodes.overview: Muso tries to capture Kagome and Inuyasha must protect her.  But there is a new snag when Muso regains Onigumo's memories.

episodes.name: Three-Sided Battle to the Death
episodes.overview: Naraku tries to absorb Muso back into his body.

episodes.name: Totosai's Rigid Training
episodes.overview: Inuyasha visits Totosai for some help on making Tesusaiga strong enough to destroy Naraku's barrier.

episodes.name: Shiori's Family and Inuyasha's Feelings
episodes.overview: To break Naraku's barrier, Inuyasha must strengthen the Tetsusaiga by making it absorb the blood of a bat-demon protecting its nest with a strong barrier.

episodes.name: The Red Tetsusaiga Breaks the Barrier!
episodes.overview: Inuyasha must decide between making Tetsusaiga stronger and keeping Shiori alive.

episodes.name: The Plot of the Panther Devas
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Company are targeted by a group of cat demons who are after the Shikon shards...

episodes.name: Target: Sesshomaru and Inuyasha
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Koga fight the panther demons and Sesshomaru joins in the fight.

episodes.name: The Panther Tribe and the Two Swords of the Fang
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Koga separately try to rescue Kagome.  Meanwhile, Sesshomaru  continues his battle against the panther demons.

episodes.name: Only You, Sango
episodes.overview: When Inuyasha and his group are approached by a man,  it turns out that the stranger has been searching for Sango,  to ask her to slay a demon that is plaguing his village.  When the group arrives in the village, Sango is surprised to meet an old acquaintance.

episodes.name: Jaken's Plan to Steal the Tetsusaiga
episodes.overview: A question from Rin prompts Jaken to question his worth to Sesshomaru. He decides to prove himself by stealing Tetsusaiga from Inuyasha.

episodes.name: Sesshomaru and the Abducted Rin
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru confronts Naraku after he has ordered Kagura to kidnap Rin.

episodes.name: Vanishing Point; Naraku Disappears
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru and Inuyasha double-team Naraku as he tries to absorb them to become stronger.

episodes.name: Gap Between the Ages
episodes.overview: The group returns to Kaede's village, at which point Kagome returns to modern-day Tokyo.

episodes.name: The Female Wolf-Demon and the Lunar Rainbow Promise
episodes.overview: A female wolf demon asks Koga to keep the promise he made to her, when she was a child.

episodes.name: Koga's Bride-To-Be
episodes.overview: Koga must resolve his issues with Ayame, while fighting off the hair demon that is after the jewel shards in his legs.

episodes.name: The Evil Within Demon's Head Castle
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and company, including a old demon exorcist, travel to Demon's Head Castle, in search of a powerful demon plaguing the people.

episodes.name: Secret of the Possessed Princess
episodes.overview: Inuyasha battles a demon that has appeared in the castle. Shortly after they take their battle outside, Sango and the old exorcist decide to go find Miroku. Meanwhile Kagome and Shippo discover a secret about the princess in the lord's chamber of the castle.

episodes.name: Kikyo's Lonely Journey
episodes.overview: Kikyo comes across an old man, who turns out to have a past connection with Onigumo when he was young.

episodes.name: The Three Sprites of the Monkey God
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the rest of the group are passing by a village, and soon learn of three monkeys that are searching for their master.

episodes.name: Nursing Battle of the Rival Lovers
episodes.overview: Kagome is forced to return home when her cold worsens. While there, she is visited by her school friends, and Inuyasha winds up competing with Hojo to determine who cares more for Kagome's health.

episodes.name: Sota's Brave Confession of Love
episodes.overview: As Inuyasha's stay with Kagome in the Modern era continues, Inuyasha takes his first trip with Kagome to a grocery store. Along the way back, they spot Sota and discover he has his first crush on a girl in his class.

episodes.name: The Suspicious Faith Healer and the Black Kirara
episodes.overview: Kuroro, who is part of Kirara's species except with more black markings, once belonged to a village. She is considered a highly intelligent youkai who helps the village by exterminating all the rats and mice there. She was chased out, though, when a spiritualist person came and said that two-tailed cats were bad fortune.

episodes.name: Plot of the Walking Dead
episodes.overview: Kikyo encounters a girl who's also a walking dead. The Inuyasha gang finds out, through the girl, about another walking dead's plan to conquer the land.

episodes.name: The Mysterious, Lecherous Monk
episodes.overview: The Inuyasha group tracks down someone who's been using Miroku's identity.

episodes.name: The Sacred Jewel Maker (1)
episodes.overview: Inuaysha and the others find a demon using a fake Sacred Jewel and, with the help of a scholar, search to find out how, and why.

episodes.name: The Sacred Jewel Maker (2)
episodes.overview: With his friends imprisoned, body and soul, inside the toad demon's slime to be sacrificed for the making of a second Sacred Jewel, Inuyasha must face off against a half-demon powered up by a dozen fake jewels alone.

episodes.name: Jaken Falls Ill
episodes.overview: Jaken is poisoned and it's up to Rin to find a cure for him before it's too late.

episodes.name: Kirara Come Home!
episodes.overview: When Sango notices that Kilala seems to have disappeared, she starts to worry, and soon everyone starts looking for her.

episodes.name: Kikyo and Kagome, Alone in the Cave
episodes.overview: Kagome and Inuyasha are fighting again and Kagome becomes so enraged she storms off. When she investigates a noise coming from a cave, she becomes trapped together with Kikyo.

episodes.name: Koga and Sesshomaru: A Dangerous Encounter
episodes.overview: While travelling, Inuyasha smells a familiar scent; it's the moth demon leader. As they battle the leader, everyone except Inuyasha gets trapped in a cocoon, where they have nightmares about their worst fears.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind the Nightmare: Battle in the Forest of Sorrow
episodes.overview: While travelling, Inuyasha smells a familiar scent; it's the moth demon leader. As they battle the leader, everyone except Inuyasha gets trapped in a cocoon, where they have nightmares about their worst fears.

episodes.name: The Snow from Seven Years Past
episodes.overview: Miroku hears that a snow maiden possessing the form of a woman from his youth is terrorizing the village men and goes out alone to investigate.

episodes.name: Assault on the Wolf-Demon Tribe!
episodes.overview: A deadly spectre arises in the northeast, driving Ayame and her wolf-youkai tribe from their territories, Koga must step in to avenge his fallen brethren.

episodes.name: The Band of Seven, Resurrected!
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the group learn about the deadly Band of Seven. This group was constructed of seven mercenaries who were executed for their inhumane acts. When Kagome senses a sacred jewel shard, Sango goes off on her own and finds her lost brother Kohaku. Meanwhile, Inuyasha encounters one of the Band of Seven, Jakotsu. Jakotsu has strange behavior and wields a strange sword that bends, posing a dangerous problem for Inuyasha.

episodes.name: The Stealthy Poison Master, Mukotsu
episodes.overview: Inuyasha goes after Jakotsu, and the others are attacked by another member of the Band of Seven; Mukotsu.

episodes.name: The Ghastly Steel Machine
episodes.overview: Inuyasha is forced to clash with Ginkotsu as he orders Kilala and Shippo to get the poisoned Miroku, Kagome, and Sango to safety. They make it to a monk's temple, unaware that Renkotsu has taken over the place.

episodes.name: Kagome, Miroku, and Sango: Desperate Situation
episodes.overview: Shippo tries to save Kagome, Miroku and Sango from a burning temple.

episodes.name: Inuyasha Shows His Tears for the First Time
episodes.overview: Inuyasha discovers that Miroku, Sango and Kagome have been poisoned.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Pure Light
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and crew enter a village where a man named Suikotsu, the name of one member of the Band of Seven, is living. They discover that he appears to be a good person. Could he truly belong to the Band of Seven?

episodes.name: Hidden in the Mist: Onward to Mt. Hakurei
episodes.overview: Dr. Suikotsu continues to fight Inuyasha.

episodes.name: Enter Bankotsu, the Leader of the Band of Seven
episodes.overview: Long ago the Lord of a nearby castle was responsible for executing the Band of Seven and now they seek their revenge by attacking the castle. Despite warnings, Inuyasha and his friends approach the castle.

episodes.name: The Big Clash: Banryu versus the Wind Scar
episodes.overview: Inuyasha has finally met Bankotsu, the Leader of the Band of Seven, and is determined to use the Tetsuiga to bring him down. But Bankotsu is confident that his Banryu will win without fail. And now, Renkotsu has discovered Kagome's ability to see Shikon Jewel shards. Can the Wind Scar defeat Bankotsu and his Banryu?

episodes.name: Afloat on the Lake Surface: The Barrier of Hijiri Island
episodes.overview: Inuyasha battles with Bankotsu on the island of Hijiri without being able to use the Wind Scar. Miroku learns that Naraku is using the great priest's power to create a barrier around the island of Hijiri weakening Kirara and Shippo, and making Inuyasha unable to use the Wind Scar. Miroku manages to destroy the barrier to allow Inuyasha to regain the power to use the Wind Scar. However, Bankotsu is still confident in defeating Inuyasha.

episodes.name: The Sacred Vajra and the Mystery of the Living Buddha
episodes.overview: Bankotsu continues to fight Inuyasha on Hijiri island, but the island holds one more secret.

episodes.name: Koga's Solitary Battle
episodes.overview: Koga, Ginta and Hakkaku go to Mt. Hakurei and meet up with some of the seven warriors. Koga fights in a rough battle with them and gets injured. Meanwhile, Jakotsu meets up with Sesshomaru and they fight. Inuyasha, Kagome, Shippo and Kirara are near Mt. Hakurei also, but then, Inuyasha suddenly smells the blood and scent of the wolves and rushes over.

episodes.name: Lured by the Black Light
episodes.overview: Jakotsu attacks Sesshomaru while Suikotsu kidnaps Rin. However, Suikotsu's good alter ego takes over temporarily as he takes Rin to the village where he tended to children. When villagers ask for Suikotsu to leave, his evil alter ego takes over and kills one of the villagers. Jakotsu then shows up from hiding. Meanwhile, Kikyo and Sesshomaru head off to go after the three despite the barrier on the town.

episodes.name: The Exposed Face of Truth
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru battles with Jakotsu on Mount Hakurei while Suikotsu holds Rin captive. As Suikotsu is about to kill Rin, Kikyo fires an arrow at Suikotsu's neck making him change to his good alter ego. The counterpart wishes for Kikyo to remove the Shikon shard from his neck so he won't have to suffer the thought of killing anymore because of his evil alter ego. Jakotsu removes the Shikon shard and Suikotsu is reduced to a skeleton.

episodes.name: Vanished in a River of Flames
episodes.overview: Renkotsu traps Kagome, Kouga, Shippo, Kirara, Hakkaku and Ginta in a cave that is surrounded by a river of fire. Inuyasha must fight Renkotsu to protect his friends.

episodes.name: Into the Depths of Mt. Hakurei
episodes.overview: Sango and Miroku explore a cave in Mt. Hakurei, where they expect to find Naraku, but fall into Kagura's trap. Sango's weapon is useless against Kagura, the Wind Sorceress. Can Miroku defend them with his Wind Tunnel? Worried that Sango and Miroku have not returned, Inuyasha goes after them, determined to cross the sacred barrier of Mt. Hakurei.

episodes.name: Divine Malice of the Saint
episodes.overview: Inuyasha, in his human form, struggles to stay alive during a deadly fight with Jakotsu. When Miroku and Sango find Hakushin in the depths of the mountain, will they be able to destroy the barrier that has suppressed Inuyasha's half-demon powers?

episodes.name: Fare Thee Well: Jakotsu's Requiem
episodes.overview: Inuyasha fights for his life against Jakotsu. Kikyo meets Hakushin. What will happen to the sacred barrier after Kikyo intervenes?

episodes.name: Final Battle: The Last and Strongest of the Band of Seven
episodes.overview: Now that the sacred barrier is down, Kagome and the rest of the gang head up Mt. Hakurei. Inuyasha runs into Bankotsu, deep inside the mountain and is forced to fight him. Can Inuyasha win, now that Bankotsu has seven Shikon shards.?

episodes.name: The Power of Banryu: Duel to the Death on Mt. Hakurei
episodes.overview: Inuyasha battles with Bankotsu, who is using Banryu, a weapon infused with a demonic aura. Kagome senses that the Shikon shards inside Mt. Hakurei are becoming tainted.

episodes.name: Beyond the Darkness - Naraku Reborn!
episodes.overview: Inuyasha is lying trapped and unconscious inside Mt. Hakurei, where Naraku's new body is being created. Also, trapped inside are Inuyasha's companions and Koga. Will Inuyasha awaken, before Naraku tries to destroy him?

episodes.name: Farewell Kikyo, My Beloved
episodes.overview: Inuyasha helps Koga to safety and everyone gets out of the mountain safely. Meanwhile, Naraku confronts Kikyo with his new body.

episodes.name: The Darkness in Kagome's Heart
episodes.overview: In the beginning, Inuyasha goes to look for Kikyo. Kagome, Sango, and Miroku get caught by people, and get taken to a village. Kagome gets taken into one of the huts there, leaving Sango and Miroku to fight the people.

episodes.name: Transform Heartache into Courage!
episodes.overview: Failing to find Kikyo after sent on a wild goose chase by a priest, Inuyasha is unaware that Kagome and the others are in danger. Miroku and Sango have to defend themselves against murderous guards, while Kagome is in danger from Kagura and a strange baby who is trying to control Kagome's heart.

episodes.name: Don't Boil It! The Terrifying Dried-Up Demon
episodes.overview: When Kagome brings back some rare dried food from the feudal era, Inuyasha is forced to travel to modern Japan to protect her, as the food is actually made from dried demons.

episodes.name: Battle Against the Dried-Up Demons at the Cultural Festival
episodes.overview: While Kagome has her hands full preparing for the Cultural Festival, another dried-food demon appears. After Inuyasha saves the day, Kagome admits that there may be three more demons on the loose. Later, when Inuyasha sees Kagome in a love scene with Hojo in the school play, his temper flares. Will Inuyasha and Hojo be forced to fight over Kagome?

episodes.name: Chokyukai and the Abducted Bride
episodes.overview: This pig demon called Chokyukai has been wandering around the countryside forcing young women to marry him. But when he puts the magical tiara that makes the women fall in love with him on Kagome, InuYasha is the one who's lovestricken!

episodes.name: Shippo's New Technique, the Heart Scar
episodes.overview: Shippo meets a group of fox demons who heard a legend about the mighty and powerful Shippo and they ask him to protect them from a lizard demon. Shippo uses his ultimate attack, the Heart Scar.

episodes.name: Trap of the Cursed Wall Hanging
episodes.overview: The Inuyasha gang hears about a village of demon women and they decide to find it.

episodes.name: Miroku's Most Dangerous Confession
episodes.overview: Inuyasha must save Sango and Miroku from the village women and the demon that is controlling them..

episodes.name: The Woman Who Loved Sesshomaru (1)
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his group travel to a coastal town where they meet a beautiful woman, who attempts to steal the Tetsusaiga.

episodes.name: The Woman Who Loved Sesshomaru (2)
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Sesshomaru confront Sara, but Sara has a terrible secret.

episodes.name: The Last Banquet of Miroku's Master
episodes.overview: Miroku finds out that Mushin, the monk who raised him, is dying, and he goes to see him.

episodes.name: A Strange Invisible Demon Appears!
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his group meet someone they know when they travel to a small town and Miroku plans to make use of his exorcist skills to earn some money.

episodes.name: An Ancestor Named Kagome
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his gang take on the task of purifying a cursed sword brought to them by Akitoki Hojo, ancestor to the Hojo in Kagome's time. Back in present day Japan, Kagome finds out that Hojo has ancestor named Kagome, who married Akitoki! What does this mean for Kagome? Does she stay in the feudal era and marry Akitoki, or is it mere coincidence?

episodes.name: Mountain of Demons: Survival of the Duo
episodes.overview: While on a mission to purify the Ken blade, Kagome and Akitoki become separated from Inuyasha and the others. Then Kagome and Akitoki get attacked by the ninja demons. What will be their fate?

episodes.name: The Great Duel at Shoun Falls
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the others go to meet the ninja demon, who has taken Kagome hostage, at Shoun Falls.

episodes.name: Eternal Love, the Naginata of Kenkon
episodes.overview: Hoshiyomi plans to destroy humanity using the Naginata of Kenkon.

episodes.name: Entei, the Demon Horse Unleashed!
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his group decide to investigate a series of murders which they hear were committed by a woman with a baby.

episodes.name: Untamed Entei and Horrible Hakudoshi
episodes.overview: Naraku's child Hakudoshi kills Rygokoki, takes his weapon and earns the right to ride on the legendry horse demon Entei.

episodes.name: 3,000 Leagues in Search of Father
episodes.overview: When Inuyasha and his friends visit a a new town, they find out that a headless demon has been frightening the townspeople.

episodes.name: Hosenki and the Last Shard
episodes.overview: Inuyasha searches for Myoga to figure out how to get to the border between this world and the next, and his father's grave, where the last shard of the sacred jewel may be hidden.

episodes.name: Bizarre Guards at the Border of the Afterlife
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and his friends attempt to reach the graveyard located beyond the border of this world.

episodes.name: The Fiery Bird Master, Princess Abi
episodes.overview: After Inuyasha and his friends return from the Land of Fire, they come across several villages where everyone has had all their blood sucked out of them.

episodes.name: The Tragic Love Song of Destiny (1)
episodes.overview: Kaede narrates a special episode that explains Kikyo's life as a priestess (a miko), how she met Inuyasha, how she ended up receiving the Shikon no Tama and more.

episodes.name: The Tragic Love Song of Destiny (2)
episodes.overview: Kaede narrates a special episode that explains Kikyo's life as a miko, her recieving the Shikon no Tama and Naraku's trap for her and Inuyasha.

episodes.name: The Single Arrow of Chaos
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the others are on a mission to find Princess Abi and her nest of birds. However, they must get past Hakudoshi, first.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Light that Guides the Saint
episodes.overview: Princess Abi goes after a group of villagers who are hiding in a cave.

episodes.name: Kagome's Instinctive Choice
episodes.overview: Kagome must decide if she wants to save Kikyo, or not.

episodes.name: Protect and Plunder!
episodes.overview: Princess Abi no longer wants to be in league with Naraku.

episodes.name: The Cruel Reunion of Fate
episodes.overview: Kohaku must kill the castle guards to retrieve the infant, Naraku's incarnation.

episodes.name: The Demon Linked With the Netherworld
episodes.overview: After meeting Kikyo, Inuyasha and the gang rush to stop Naraku, who confronts Abi and her mother.

episodes.name: The Demon Protector of the Sacred Jewel Shard!
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the gang follow Naraku. Before the group can confront their nemesis, Inuyasha must battle Hosenki, an old friend of Inuyasha's father.

episodes.name: Final Battle at the Graveside! Sesshomaru Versus Inuyasha
episodes.overview: Naraku appears to steal Hosenki's shard, but Sesshomaru arrives on the scene, to everyone's surprise.

episodes.name: Destroy Naraku with the Adamant Barrage!
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru faces off with Naraku, while Inuyasha tries to cut Hosenki's diamond body to gain a new power.

episodes.name: Stampede of the Countless Demon Rats!
episodes.overview: Naraku lets Hakudoshi employ a new method to bring Kikyo out of hiding--a tidal wave of endless demon rodents. Also, Kohaku finds himself in a dilemma.

episodes.name: Kohaku's Decision and Sango's Heart
episodes.overview: Sango attempts to stop Kohaku and the demon rats, while Hakudoshi tries to subdue Kikyo's Mayose spell, intended to destroy the stampede of rodents.

episodes.name: The Lucky but Two-Timing Scoundrel!
episodes.overview: Kagome returns home to get some rest without telling Inuyasha. Angrily he follows her and breaks her bike. Despite spending the day trying to fix it, Kagome is still furious and tells her friends he is cheating on her. Her friends then ask to meet him. How will this end for Kagome and Inuyasha?

episodes.name: Miroku's Past Mistake
episodes.overview: Miroku is confronted by an old flame from his past, to Sango's chagrin.

episodes.name: Forever with Lord Sesshomaru
episodes.overview: Rin has her doubts about whether or not she will be with Sesshomaru forever, after Jaken tells her that he and Sesshomaru will probably live longer than her, because she's mortal and they're demons.

episodes.name: Kohaku, Sango and Kirara: The Secret Flower Garden
episodes.overview: Kirara recalls Sango and Kohaku's past, when they were children.

episodes.name: Possessed by a Parasite: Shippo, Our Worst Enemy
episodes.overview: A parasite demon infects Shippo, causing him to attack his friends, but Inuyasha seems to be the Shippo's real target.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Key to Defeating Naraku
episodes.overview: Naraku confronts Kikyo, while Hakudoshi creates a new monstrosity for Inuyasha and friends to deal with.

episodes.name: The Bond Between Them, Use the Sacred Jewel Shard! (1)
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and the others find a strange man with demonic powers. Could this be the reincarnation of Naraku?

episodes.name: The Bond Between Them, Use the Sacred Jewel Shard! (2)
episodes.overview: As Inuyasha and his team go after Kagura, they find a weakness which they plan to use to defeat their opponent, Naraku. Yet, Naraku has already taken steps to lead Inuyasha and his team into a terrible trap.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Kagome Higurashi, an average ninth grader, gets pulled into an ancient well by a demon, bringing her 500 years in the past to a feudal era. There she meets Inuyasha, a half-demon who seeks the Shikon Jewel to make himself a full-fledged demon. With Inuyasha and new friends, Kagome's search for the Jewel of Four Souls begins...

episodes.name: Naraku's Heart
episodes.overview: Hakudoshi is scheming to take Naraku's place. He steals Kagome's Shikon Jewel shards and entices Kagura to betray Naraku.

episodes.name: Kagura's Wind
episodes.overview: Upon healing her wounds inflicted by Naraku, using Midoriko's soul, Kikyo runs into Inuyasha again and reveals the secret to destroying Naraku.

episodes.name: Meido Zangetsuha
episodes.overview: It is the day of the annual Fox Demon Exam at the Demon Inn. Miroku and his friends get stuck taking the tests. Shippo hopes to be promoted in rank for playfully getting revenge on Inuyasha.

episodes.name: Dragon-Scaled Tessaiga
episodes.overview: The swordsmith Toshu forges a demon-blade using one of Ryujin's scales, and the Dakki was born. Meanwhile, every time Inuyasha tries to attack, he is undermined by demonic energy.

episodes.name: The Great Holy Demon Spirit's Test
episodes.overview: The Tetsusaiga has attained the power of the dragon scales. In order to be able to quickly use the demonic power well, Inuyasha has no choice but to go through training.

episodes.name: The End of Moryomaru
episodes.overview: Inuyasha and Koga arrive at the scene of Moryomaru and Naraku's fight. But Moryomaru, who wants his Shikon shards, catches Koga.

episodes.name: The Mausoleum of Mount Azusa
episodes.overview: Kikyo has been contaminated by Naraku's spider web. In order to save her, Inuyasha and Kagome need the bowstring kept in Mount Azusa's mausoleum.

episodes.name: Among the Twinkling Stars
episodes.overview: Kikyo attempts to purify Naraku and his Shikon shards along with Midoriko's will that controls the shards in Koga's legs.

episodes.name: Sesshomaru in the Underworld
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru visits his mother to ask how he can expand the Tenseiga's Meido Zangetsuha technique. In response, his mother uses the Meido Stone that Sesshomaru's father gave her.

episodes.name: Flowers Drenched in Sadness
episodes.overview: The Flower Prince is a demon that feasts on saddened or anguished hearts. Dazzled by the flower's fragrance, Inuyasha becomes entangled in a fake dream.

episodes.name: Kanna's Gravestone
episodes.overview: The Mirror Demon steals Tetsusaiga's demonic energy. Inuyasha counterattacks despite enduring some fierce blows, but all of his attacks aimed at the Mirror Demon end up being taken by Kanna.

episodes.name: Sango's Feelings, Miroku's Resolve
episodes.overview: During a new moon, Sango and Miroku face off against a "Bone-collecting" demon. During the battle, Miroku is forced to use his wind tunnel twice, resulting in his being poisoned. To protect him, Sango coats her hiraikotsu in poison and uses it to destroy the demon, destroying her weapon in the process.

episodes.name: A Complete Meido
episodes.overview: The demon Shishinki approaches Sesshomaru for a fight, having been defeated by Sesshomaru's father long ago. To Sesshomaru's surprise, Shishinki attacks him using a complete Meido Zangetsuha and claims Sesshomaru's father stole the technique from him. Sesshomaru attacks with his Meido, but Shishinki's absorbs it.

episodes.name: In Pursuit of Naraku
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru visits Totosai, who confirms that his father gave him Tenseiga so Sesshomaru could perfect the Meido Zangetsuha before he planned Inu Yasha to reabsorb Tenseiga back into the Tetsusaiga.

episodes.name: True Heir
episodes.overview: Seshomaru challanges Inuyasha in order to see if Inuyasha is worth having Tetsusaiga. He uses a fragment of Kanna's mirror to create a replica of the sword from Tenseiga.

episodes.name: Hitomiko's Barrier
episodes.overview: The priestess Hitomiko loses her life at Naraku's hands, but she is resurrected and locks Kagome within a barrier. Then, the true spiritual power of Mount Azusa's bow reveals itself!

episodes.name: Magatsuhi's Evil Will
episodes.overview: Inuyasha's group returns to Kaede's village to tell her of Kikyo's death. As they talk, she states that Kagome's power was probably sealed by Magatsuhi, the evil will of the Shikon Jewel that did it out of fear of Kagome's powers.

episodes.name: The Day of Days
episodes.overview: Kohaku remains unconscious after being stared down by Magatsuhi, the evil will. Kagome is worried, but she has to buckle down and study for her entrance exams, so she decides to return home.

episodes.name: Kohaku's Shard
episodes.overview: Sesshomaru chases after the evil will, Magatsuhi. But it's only part of a trap set up by Byakuya of the Dreams. Magatsuhi finds Kohaku lying unconscious, and he tries to deliver his Shikon shard to Naraku.

episodes.name: When the Jewel is Whole
episodes.overview: Kohaku successfully drives Magatsuhi out of his body just as Sesshomaru arrives, who manages to cut Magatsuhi in half, destroying part of him. Naraku then tries to take Kohaku's shard himself, but Sesshomaru attacks with his Bakusaiga, which causes Naraku's body to explode.

episodes.name: Inside Naraku
episodes.overview: Inuyasha's group leave to defeat Naraku, leaving Shippo behind. As they find Naraku and Byakuya in a cloud of miasma, they see Sesshomaru enter Naraku's body in search of Rin. As Inuyasha's group enters, Miroku pauses to propose to Sango.

episodes.name: Naraku: The Trap of Darkness
episodes.overview: Inuyasha's heart is devoured by the Shikon Jewel's poison, and he turns into his demon form helpless as  the darkness in his heart takes control of him.

episodes.name: Naraku: The Trap of Light
episodes.overview: Kagome's spiritual powers are restored, and divine light is revived in Naraku's Shikon Jewel. However, Naraku uses this as a decoy to lure Sango into his trap.

episodes.name: Naraku's Uncertain Wish
episodes.overview: Naraku has been living as a demon despite having a human heart. While fighting him, Kagome asks about his true wish.

episodes.name: Thoughts Fall Short
episodes.overview: Naraku heads for the Bone Eater's Well and vanishes! Before disappearing, Naraku makes his last wish for Kagome, injured at the hands of Byakuya, to be swallowed into Meido, the Path to the Underworld.

episodes.name: Toward Tomorrow
episodes.overview: When the last person to obtain the Shikon Jewel makes the one correct wish, the jewel will be purified and disappear entirely from this world. The long journey of Inuyasha and his companions comes to end and thus concludes this Feudal Fairy Tale.

2.name: The Final Act
2.overview: Inuyasha, Kagome, Miroku, Sango, Shippou and their neko-mata friend Kirara, are now in the final leg of their quest to put an end to the elusive demon, Naraku and all of the chaos and evil he has caused, and to ultimately undo the unfortunate karma of the Jewel of Four Souls. Their journey, however, will not be easy as their remaining enemies put out all the stops to make sure that they do not accomplish their goal.
